description: Application for Non-Material Minor Amendments to planning consent ref: P2017/3103/FUL dated 12 September 2018 that granted: Demolition of the existing buildings and erection of a 27-storey building (part 10, part 15, part 20, part 25, part 27-storeys) with 3 basement levels to provide for 63,507 square metres (GIA) of office floorspace (Use Class B1(a)) and 1,222 square metres (GIA) of flexible retail/professional services/restaurant/caf√© floorspace (Use Class A1/A2/A3) along with associated access and servicing arrangements, cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping works. The non-material minor amendments sought relate to amendments to the wording of conditions 32 (Safeguarding Crossrail - Foundation Design), 34 (London Underground - Design and Method Statements), 36 (Network Rail - Drainage), 38 (Network Rail - Excavation/Earthworks), 39 (Network Rail - Method Statements), 40 (Network Rail - Asset Protection Project Manager), and 41 (Network Rail - Tunnels) to amend the trigger points for the discharge of these pre-commencement conditions. Alterations to the wording of condition 37 (Network Rail - Piling).
